summary: This bill, the Conflict-free Leaving Employment and Activity Restrictions Path Act (CLEAR Path Act), aims to prevent conflicts of interest after government service. It amends title 18 of the United States Code to extend post-employment restrictions for officials in Senate-confirmed positions, particularly regarding representing foreign governmental entities of countries of concern. The bill also establishes a mechanism for the Secretary of State, in consultation with the Attorney General, to modify the definition of "country of concern" through a joint resolution of approval from Congress.
